The International School of Moscow Part of The British Schools Group
Dear Parents,
A professional photographer will be at The International School of Moscow during the following days: May 27-28, June 3-7 2013. He will be taking your child’s individual photo as well as sibling photos, class photos and the whole school photo.
Photographer’s schedule:
Individual photos + class photos:
Monday, 27th May: EYFS, 1A, 1B, 2C
Tuesday, 28th May: 1C, 2A, 2B, 3A, 3B
Individual photos:
Monday, 3d June: Y4, 7B, Y8, Y9, Y10
Tuesday, 4th June: Y5-10 Tottenham camp participants, Y5, Y6, 7A Class photos
Wednesday, 5th June, Thursday, 6th June:
Class photos Year 4 – 9
Whole Upper School photo
Whole Lower School photo
Whole school Council photo Y1-Y10
House Captains photo
Friday, 7th June
Sibling photos
The photographs will be processed and you will have the opportunity to select and purchase them before the end of the term.
Please make sure on the days of your child(rens) individual photos, class photos and sibling photos he/she needs to come to school wearing his/her Full Summer Uniform including blazers. Also please pay attention to the footwear, as it is a very important part of the uniform.
If your child has PE on the day of the photographs, please make sure he/she brings his/her full summer uniform.
It is important that your child is present on the day when the photographs of his/her year group are taken, as there won't be an opportunity to schedule another session.
Info about the photographer:
Vladimir Baych, a member of Union of Photographers of Russia, has been successfully working in the genre of child photography for more than 15 years. He is famous for making covers for children’s magazines, studio portraits and reportages. Recently he has been working with advertising agencies and private schools.
For more information, please visit his website: www.baych.ru
Kind regards,
Paul Seedhouse
Headmaster
